name: THE Z LAND: FPS SURVIVAL
description:
the Z virus infected the planet, and you are one of the last survivors! Alone or in groups you will have to survive in a hostile world populated by living dead!
Find weapons, hunt for food, go to the cities to refuel, find a car, get resources and build your base!
But be careful zombies may not be the biggest threat to you ...

In Z Land , you can also fight with friends in the PVP arena !
Play it with your Friends.....

Happy hunting!

Features:

► more than 15 different weapons!
► Choice of 5 characters!
► 2 different maps!
► Single or multiplayer mode!
► Different type of enemies!
► Building system!
► Day / night cycle!
► Craft system!
► Water and food system!
► Several vehicles!
